PDesireAudio is disabled. Maybe it\'s too much for you…

Treble ClearAudio is enabled. So, so, sharp!
Bass ClearAudio is enabled. Whoa, that bass is whooming!
PDesire\'s Surround Sound Recording is enabled. Whoa, it feels so real!
HTC Surround Sound Recording is enabled. Many people hate HTC, but HTC knows how to utilize audio correctly.

I am YandereAudio, your personal assistant for Project Shinka-PD, hihi ^~^ 
I was created by PDesire as a replication of his personality in Project Shinka-PD. 
He coded me to assist you while calibrating Project Meli. 
I hope it is okay for you that I call you master :3 
Are you ready for fantastic audio? ^~^
Enable anonymous analytics. This will help PDesire what features should be improved. Any data will be kept private and secure.
Enable anonymous analytics and crashlytics. This will help PDesire how to improve this app. Any data will be kept private and secure.

Google Firebase analytics is a service by Google to provide analytics from this app. 
The following will be logged: Your gender, device, Android version, which country you are living in and what you are doing in this app. \This data will be saved on Google servers and I only have access to the named data. 
I warrant that any of the named data will be kept private and is only for improving Project Meli. 
You will not get spied on nor will this data be used for payments. 
As a proof, you can take a look on the source code of this app.

Fabric.io analytics and crashlytics is a service by Fabric.io to provide analytics from this app. 
The following will be logged: Which country you are living in, if this app crashes and what you are doing in this app. 
This data will be saved on Fabric.io servers and I only have access to the named data. 
I warrant that any of the named data will be kept private and is only for improving Project Meli. 
You will not get spied on nor will this data be used for payments. 
As a proof, you can take a look on the source code of this app.
It is required to restart your phone if you changed something in the settings.
Replaces the Android main audio effects (bundle and reverb) with the PDAEC audio effect libraries
